thread.title: BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Medical Officer Posts
thread.title_full: BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Medical Officer Posts

author: publisher12
title: BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Medical Officer Posts
text: BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Medical Officer Posts BARC Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Medical Officer Posts: Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC) has invited applications for the recruitment of Medical Officer (General Medicine, Orthopaedic) on Locum basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 07-02-2017 at 10:30 hrs. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… BARC Vacancy Details: 1. Medical Officer (General Medicine) 2. Medical Officer (Orthopaedic) Age Limit: Candidates age should not be more than 50 years as on 01-02-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess MD/ DNB (General Medicine) or MS/ DNB (Orthopaedic). Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with original certificates regarding qualification, registration and experience, one set of attested copies of certificates, one passport size photograph at Conference Room, 1st floor, Admn.Wing, BARC Hospital, Anushaktinagar, Mumbai 400 094 on 07-02-2017 at 10:30 hrs. Date & Time of Interview: 07-02-2017 at 10:30 hrs. For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below…
